description:
Embrace all-season comfort and performance with the Arc’Word long-sleeve tee. Made from a blend of soft, organically grown cotton and high-performance polyester, this shirt ensures a comfortable feel while keeping you cool. The trim fit not only enhances the style but also facilitates easy layering, while gusseted underarms and light stretch grant you the freedom to move with unrestricted ease.

  • Fabric combines organic cotton and polyester for comfort and technical performance
  • Underarm gussets allow freedom of movement
  • Regular fit feels like an old favourite since day 1
name: Arc'teryx Captive Arc'Word Shirt - Men's
